alert.note: Alert for Gadsden; Leon (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 2:57PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Gadsden and central Leon Counties through 330 PM EDT... At 256 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Tallahassee Comm College, or near Tallahassee, moving north at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tallahassee, Midway, Havana, Tallahassee Comm College, Florida State University, Doak Campbell Stadium, Freemont, Macon Community Park, Tallahassee Memorial Hosp, Florence, Scotland, Jamieson, Shady Rest, Lake Ella, Tallahassee Mall, Branchville, Hinson, Dogtown, Forest Meadows Park and Levy Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
